name: Shotstack
description: Shotstack is a video, image and audio editing service that allows for the automated generation of videos, images and audio using JSON and a RESTful API. You arrange and configure an edit and POST it to the API which will render your media and provide a file location when complete. For more details visit [shotstack.io](https://shotstack.io) or checkout our [getting started](https://shotstack.gitbook.io/docs/guides/getting-started) documentation. There are two main API's, one for editing and generating assets (Edit API) and one for managing hosted assets (Serve API). The Edit API base URL is: https://api.shotstack.io/{version} The Serve API base URL is: https://api.shotstack.io/serve/{version}
